thread.section_title: Hotel Claridge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cute hotel convenient location
thread.title_full: Cute hotel convenient location - Review of Hotel Claridge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Caro E
title: Cute hotel convenient location
text: The hotel rooms are very nice and clean , the location is very convenient close to champs elysee. At night the hotel is guarded by one person at the reception he is very helpful but if the hotel was crowded don't know how he would do it all alone. We ordered room service and were done around 11 pm there was no one to come take the food we had to leave them on our room door till the next day. The breakfast is not bad not a huge variety though.
